entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:35 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
